Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Patent Disclosure Assistant Chrome Extension

Add complete patent technical disclosure writing assistant with:

Core Features:
- 4-step guided form for collecting patent information
- Multiple document templates \(default/detailed/simple\)
- Real-time Markdown preview
- Automatic quality checking system
- Multi-format export \(Markdown/HTML/PDF/TXT\)
- Local document management with auto-save

Technical Implementation:
- Chrome Extension Manifest V3
- Content script for page text extraction
- Background service worker for data processing
- Performance optimization module
- Responsive UI design with CSS animations

Documentation:
- Complete README with installation guide
- Test documentation and compatibility matrix
- File structure documentation
- Installation instructions

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix extension layout and permissions issues

Layout improvements \(popup.css\):
- Increase popup width from 420px to 520px for better readability
- Increase popup height from 600px to 650px
- Enhance tab button padding \(12px 8px → 14px 16px\)
- Increase tab font size \(12px → 13px\)
- Improve header spacing and subtitle line-height
- Increase main content padding \(20px → 24px\)
- Expand form group margin-bottom \(16px → 20px\)
- Increase input field padding \(10px 12px → 11px 14px\)
- Enhance help text padding \(10px → 12px\)
- Improve document item and preview spacing

Manifest fixes \(manifest.json\):
- Remove ''type: module'' from service worker \(no ES6 modules used\)
- Add ''contextMenus'' permission \(required by chrome.contextMenus API\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
